name: Loop Control
description:
Loop Control

You are a robot on a dying planet with a mechanical snake looping around you. This snake went insane and you better don't touch it!

On that planet there are circuit boards. Collect them for getting control over the snake. But when the snake collects them you will loose control! If you have lost too much the snake will kill you!

You can control your robot with
WASD or Arrow Keys

Good Luck!

Ludum Dare 47

This is a ludum dare game and was created within 72h. The theme was: Stuck in a loop.
